segments.text: Oh , dear ! which dress should I choose ? I can't make up my mind . Please help me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know I don't know anything about fashion .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Which dress do you like best ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , they are both all right .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , no . I mean you look very nice in both of them .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Mike , that's no help to me at all . I can't wear both of them at the same time . I want a decision .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But after all , it is your decision , not mine .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , yes . The green dress is very smart . but I can't be sure if it goes with a hat .
segments.speaker: S1
